 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עוּר‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==chaff== ([[BDB#J|J]] Aramaic (Talmud, rare), Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***mote*** (in eye, tending to cause ***blindness*** [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִוֵּר‎</span>]) according to Arabic Lexicons, [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>2195</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ע‎</span> [[Dan.2.35|Dan 2:35]] (in simile). [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עֵז‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עִזִּין‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ענז‎</span>
